summary: TRANSMISSION ISSUES INCLUDING SHUTTERING AND DELAYED FORWARD MOTION WHEN ACCELERATING. ALSO SOUNDS LIKE IT IDLES  TOO LOW WHEN STOPPED AT A LIGHT VIBRATES LIKE IT'S GOING TO DIE. SOUNDS LIKE SOMETHING IS GOING TO FALL OUT FROM UNDER THE HOOD WHEN TRANSMISSION CHANGES GEARS. ALL HAPPENS WHEN CITY DRIVING. ALSO CHECK ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON WHEN THESE ISSUES BEGAN.
